module.name: KeyPointsGoodFeaturesToTrack
module.description: Extract keypoints of type GoodFeaturesToTrack on image

param.name: auto_process
param.description: If yes the module processes with a timer at fixed fps, if no the module processes based on the time stamp of the input stream

param.name: allow_unsync_input
param.description: If yes the module accepts that its input can be on a different time stamp. Only relevant if the module has many inputs. Use at your own risks.

param.name: class
param.description: Class of the module (define the module's function)

param.name: descriptor
param.description: The keypoint descriptor: ORB, BRIEF or Opponent. Leave empty for none.

param.name: max_corners
param.description: Maximum number of corners to return. If there are more corners than are found, the strongest of them is returned.

param.name: quality_level
param.description: Parameter characterizing the minimal accepted quality of image corners.

param.name: min_dist
param.description: Minimum possible Euclidean distance between the returned corners

param.name: block_size
param.description: Size of an average block for computing a derivative covariation matrix over each pixel neighborhood

param.name: use_harris_detector
param.description: Parameter indicating whether to use a Harris detector

param.name: k
param.description: Free parameter of the Harris detector

output.name: output
output.description: List of tracked object with KeyPoint and features
